summary: This document is a Certificate of Corporate Resolutions for Zone Development Corp, authorizing Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas to manage various accounts on behalf of the corporation. It lists Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke as authorized signers, detailing their powers and responsibilities regarding the accounts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an authorized signer for the corporate resolutions, allowing him to manage accounts with Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Darren Indyke
persons.context: Darren Indyke is also listed as an authorized signer for the corporate resolutions, with similar powers as Epstein.

connections.description: Both individuals are authorized signers for Zone Development Corp, indicating a close working relationship.

keyFacts: The document certifies corporate resolutions for Zone Development Corp.
Jeffrey Epstein and Darren Indyke are authorized signers for the corporation's accounts.
The resolutions allow Deutsche Bank to manage various types of accounts for the corporation.
The document emphasizes that the bank can rely on the instructions of the authorized signers.
There is a provision for the delegation of powers by the authorized signers.
